data.title: Jazz on the Patio Summer Series: Andy Roberts and Friends
meta_keywords: Jazz on the Patio Summer Series Andy Roberts and Friends at 312 Paradise Lane
data.meta_description: Jazz on the Patio Summer Series: Andy Roberts and Friends Hosted By The Barn at Paradise Station. Event starts on Thursday, 22 August 2024 and happening at 312 Paradise Lane, Ronks, PA, United States, Pennsylvania 17572, Strasburg, PA. Register or Buy Tickets, Price information.
data.text:
About the event Jazz on the Patio Summer Series: Andy Roberts and Friends

Join us at The Barn at Paradise Station - Lancaster Countyâ€™s newest and coolest event venue! Enjoy some of Lancasterâ€™s best jazz groups, while dining on the gorgeous blue flagstone patio overlooking the Strasburg Rail Road and stunning countryside.

Served small plates fare as well as wine and beer available for purchase.

Doors open at 6 p.m. Music beginning at 6:30 p.m. Reservations accepted but not required.

Casual dress. No cover. Free parking.

In the event of inclement weather, Jazz on the Patio will be held inside the Lower Level of the Barn.

Running every Thursday night May 30-August 29, 2024. For a full schedule, please visit www.barnatparadisestation.com/events.

ABOUT ANDY ROBERTS

Andy Roberts has been active in the Central PA music scene for many years. By age 15, he was gigging with rock and country bands at local clubs. Upon discovering Oscar Peterson and Dave Brubeck, he became further inspired by the challenges of jazz, and after receiving the Joe Zawinul scholarship, enrolled in Berklee College of Music, Boston Massachusetts, graduating in 1989.

Currently, Roberts maintains a busy schedule of performing, writing and music directing. As a freelance jazz pianist, he has had the opportunity to perform with many great musicians from the tri-state area. Also known for his keyboard work, Andy is a seasoned rock and blues keyboardist as well.

â€‹In theater, Roberts has 30+ years experience writing original musical revues. Since 2009 he has been music director/pianist for The American Music Theatre in Lancaster, PA. There he arranges, plays piano and conducts the vocalists and band in their original productions.
